name: Hikvision
description: Hikvision is the world's leading provider of innovative security products and solutions. In India, Prama Hikvision is the market leader, offering an extensive portfolio of video surveillance products including Turbo HD Analog cameras, EasyIP network cameras, PTZ cameras, and AI-driven solutions. Known for high-quality imaging and the proprietary H.265+ compression technology.

warranty_info.text_summary: 3 Years Standard Warranty on Projects, 2 Years on Retail Products.

faqs.question: How do I reset my Hikvision NVR password?
faqs.answer: You can use the SADP Tool to export the XML key file and send it to technical support, or use the Hik-Connect app for a self-service reset.

faqs.question: What is Hikvision ColorVu?
faqs.answer: ColorVu technology enables cameras to produce colorful videos even in extremely dimly lit environments.

seo.meta_title: Hikvision Cameras & DVRs Online India | Authorized Dealer
seo.meta_description: Buy genuine Hikvision CCTV cameras, DVRs, and NVRs at best prices in India. Authorized Partner with full warranty and support.

name: CP Plus
tagline: Upar Wala Sab Dekh Raha Hai
description: CP PLUS is India's No.1 security and surveillance brand. They are dedicated to democratizing security by making it affordable and accessible. With a wide range of cameras suitable for Indian conditions, CP Plus dominates the residential and SME market with reliable analog and IP solutions.

warranty_info.text_summary: 2 Years Standard Warranty. Insta-service available in metro cities.

faqs.question: What app does CP Plus use?
faqs.answer: CP Plus uses gCMOB for smartphones and KVMS Pro for desktop monitoring.

faqs.question: Is CP Plus an Indian brand?
faqs.answer: CP Plus is an Indian brand with global technology, specifically tailored for Indian electrical and environmental conditions.

seo.meta_title: CP Plus CCTV Camera Price List | Wireless & IP Cameras
seo.meta_description: Shop CP Plus security cameras, WiFi cameras, and DVRs. Best deals on EzyKam and Cosmic series with Indian warranty.

name: Dahua Technology
tagline: Enabling a Safer Society and Smarter Living
description: Dahua Technology is a world-leading video-centric smart IoT solution and service provider. Known for introducing HDCVI technology to the industry, Dahua offers advanced AI solutions like WizSense and WizMind, focusing on human and vehicle classification to reduce false alarms.

warranty_info.text_summary: 3 Years Warranty on Project Series, 2 Years on Distribution Series.

faqs.question: What is TiOC in Dahua?
faqs.answer: TiOC stands for Three-in-One Camera, which integrates Full-Color monitoring, Active Deterrence (siren/lights), and AI into one unit.

seo.meta_title: Dahua CCTV & AI Cameras | Authorized Distributor India
seo.meta_description: Buy Dahua HDCVI and IP cameras. Advanced WizSense AI detection technology. Official Indian warranty and support.

name: Honeywell
tagline: The Future Is What We Make It
description: Honeywell Building Technologies provides enterprise-grade security solutions. Their CCTV cameras are synonymous with durability and high standards, often used in government projects, airports, and critical infrastructure. They offer compliant, secure systems ideal for large-scale installations.

warranty_info.text_summary: Standard 1 Year. Extended warranty options available for enterprise projects.

faqs.question: Is Honeywell CCTV good for home use?
faqs.answer: While Honeywell focuses on enterprise, their Performance Series offers affordable, high-quality options suitable for premium residential security.

seo.meta_title: Honeywell Security Cameras | Enterprise CCTV Solutions
seo.meta_description: Honeywell video surveillance for business and industrial use. High-reliability IP cameras and NVRs.

name: Bosch
description: Bosch Security Systems represents the pinnacle of German engineering in video surveillance. Known for built-in video analytics (IVA) at the edge, their cameras are intelligent devices that process data before sending it to the server. Ideal for traffic monitoring, retail analytics, and high-security zones.

faqs.question: What is Intelligent Video Analytics (IVA)?
faqs.answer: Bosch IVA processes video data inside the camera itself to detect events like idle objects, loitering, or line crossing without needing a central server.

seo.meta_title: Bosch Security Cameras | Intelligent Video Analytics
seo.meta_description: Premium Bosch CCTV cameras with edge analytics. Best for traffic, government, and high-security installations in India.

name: Panasonic (i-PRO)
tagline: A Better Life, A Better World
description: Panasonic's security division (now operating largely as i-PRO) delivers rugged, long-lasting surveillance equipment. They are renowned for their low-light performance and Smart Coding technology which reduces bandwidth consumption without losing quality. A favorite in the banking and transportation sectors.

seo.meta_title: Panasonic i-PRO CCTV Cameras | Reliable Surveillance
seo.meta_description: Panasonic i-PRO security cameras known for durability and smart coding. Ideal for banks and ATMs.

name: Godrej Security Solutions
description: Godrej is a household name in India, synonymous with trust. Godrej Security Solutions offers a comprehensive range of CCTV ecosystems designed specifically for Indian homes and small businesses. Their 'SeeThru' range is user-friendly, affordable, and backed by a massive service network across the country.

warranty_info.text_summary: 1 Year Standard On-site Warranty for most kits.

faqs.question: Does Godrej provide installation?
faqs.answer: Yes, Godrej has a vast network of service partners and often provides installation support with their DIY kits.

seo.meta_title: Godrej CCTV Cameras | Home Security Kits India
seo.meta_description: Trust Godrej for your home security. Buy Godrej SeeThru CCTV kits, video door phones, and spotlight cameras.

name: Samsung (Hanwha Vision)
description: Formerly Samsung Techwin, now Hanwha Vision. They offer premium Korean technology with a heavy focus on cybersecurity and optical performance. Their Wisenet chipset provides excellent image processing. Highly trusted in government and enterprise sectors due to NDAA compliance and non-Chinese origin.

faqs.question: Is Hanwha same as Samsung CCTV?
faqs.answer: Yes, Hanwha Techwin acquired Samsung's security division. The technology and quality remain top-tier Korean engineering.

seo.meta_title: Samsung Wisenet Hanwha CCTV Cameras India
seo.meta_description: Hanwha Vision (formerly Samsung) CCTV cameras. Premium Korean security solutions with Wisenet technology.

name: Sony
description: While Sony has reduced its direct presence in the complete CCTV system market, their Image Sensors (STARVIS) power almost every high-end camera in the world. However, Sony still produces a select range of ultra-high-sensitivity network cameras used in city surveillance and critical monitoring where low-light performance is paramount.

faqs.question: Why are Sony cameras expensive?
faqs.answer: Sony manufactures the actual image sensors used in the industry. Their own branded cameras use the highest grade of these sensors for unmatched low-light clarity.

seo.meta_title: Sony Network Cameras | High Sensitivity CCTV
seo.meta_description: Sony Professional Video Security. Ultra low-light Starvis network cameras for city and industrial surveillance.

name: Tiandy
description: Tiandy Technologies is a rising giant focusing exclusively on IP solutions. They are famous for their 'Color Maker' technology which delivers full-color images at night. Tiandy is often the go-to brand for projects requiring cost-effective yet high-spec IP cameras with Starlight capabilities.

faqs.question: What is Tiandy Color Maker?
faqs.answer: It is a technology combining large aperture lenses and highly sensitive sensors to capture color video even in near-total darkness.

seo.meta_title: Tiandy IP Cameras | Starlight & Color Maker Technology
seo.meta_description: Tiandy Security India. Affordable IP cameras with Starlight night vision. Full color at night.

name: Uniview (UNV)
description: Uniview (UNV) is the pioneer of IP video surveillance in China and the third-largest player globally. They focus purely on IP technology (no analog). UNV cameras are prized for their 'Ultra 265' compression which saves massive storage space, and their robust build quality suitable for projects.

faqs.question: What is Ultra 265?
faqs.answer: Ultra 265 is UNV's deep compression technology that reduces bandwidth and storage costs by up to 95% compared to standard codecs.

seo.meta_title: Uniview (UNV) IP Cameras | Project Series Distributors
seo.meta_description: Uniview IP surveillance solutions. High-quality NVRs and IP cameras with Ultra 265 compression. Authorized dealer.

name: Ezviz
description: A subsidiary of Hikvision, Ezviz is strictly focused on the Smart Home and DIY market. Their cameras are Wi-Fi based, plug-and-play, and operate via a user-friendly cloud app. They are the market leaders for baby monitors, indoor pan-tilt cameras, and battery-powered doorbells.

faqs.question: Does Ezviz need a DVR?
faqs.answer: No, Ezviz cameras record directly to a MicroSD card inserted in the camera or to the Ezviz Cloud. They work independently via Wi-Fi.

seo.meta_title: Ezviz Smart Home Cameras | WiFi Security Cameras India
seo.meta_description: Shop Ezviz WiFi cameras for home. C6N, Outdoor WiFi cameras, and video doorbells. Easy setup with mobile app.
